entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 3:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
